  • Field Details

    • itemLinkedListMap

      public final Map<Item,LinkedList<ID>> itemLinkedListMap

  • Constructor Details

    • Simulator

      public Simulator(Map<Operation,Queue<Machine>> machines, List<Item> items, List<Operation> operations, boolean priorityFlag)
      Constructs a Simulator instance with the provided machines, items, and operations. Initializes the machine list, operation queue list, and operation time map.
      Parameters:
      machines - a map of operations to queues of machines available for processing.
      items - a list of items to be processed in the simulation.
      operations - a list of operations to be executed during the simulation.
      priorityFlag - a flag indicating whether priority should be considered in queue processing.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the provided lists are null or empty.

    • Simulator

      public Simulator()
      Constructs a Simulator instance with default settings. Initializes an empty map for machine operations and an empty list for operation queues.

  • Method Details

    • startSimulation

      public void startSimulation()
      Starts the simulation process, incrementing time and processing items until all operations and machine processes are completed.

    • printExecutionTimesOperation

      public void printExecutionTimesOperation()
      Prints the execution times for all operations and percentages relative to the total time to the console. Each operation and its corresponding execution time is printed.

    • getExecutionTimesOperation

      public Map<Operation,Float> getExecutionTimesOperation()
      Retrieves the execution times for all operations.
      Returns:
      a map containing operations and their corresponding execution times.

    • getExecutionTimesMachine

      public Map<Machine,Float> getExecutionTimesMachine()
      Retrieves the map that contains the execution times for each machine.
      Returns:
      A map where the keys are Machine objects and the values are the execution times (in seconds) for each machine.

    • getAvgExecutionTime

      public Map<Operation,Float> getAvgExecutionTime()
      Retrieves the map containing the average execution times for each operation.
      Returns:
      A map where the keys are Operations and the values are their average execution times in seconds.

    • getWaitingTime

      public Map<Item,Float> getWaitingTime()
      Retrieves the map containing the waiting times for each item.
      Returns:
      A map where the keys are Items and the values are their waiting times in seconds.

    • getExecutionPerOperation

      public Map<Operation,Integer> getExecutionPerOperation()
      Retrieves the map containing the number of executions for each operation.
      Returns:
      A map where the keys are Operations and the values are their execution counts.

    • getPpk

      public Map<Operation,Float> getPpk()
      Retrieves the map containing the total execution time for each operation.
      Returns:
      A map where the keys are Operations and the values are their total execution times in seconds.

    • printItemRoute

      public void printItemRoute()
      Prints the route of a item

    • printMachineRoute

      public void printMachineRoute()
      Prints the transitions of a machine to another.

    • getMachineRoute

      public Map<ID,Map<ID,Integer>> getMachineRoute()
      Returns:
      a Map that stores all the transitions of the machines
